comments.creator: ah3@gmx.ch
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Ant.com Toolbar 2.0.1 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: 

A function to add information, comments, files etc. to already stored (and received) emails would be helpful to organize mails paperless. Moreover, this function could be used to use Thunderbird as a small document management software. 

Reproducible: Didn't try



Expected Results:  
Implementation in future versions. Adding a small document management function could help to establish thunderbird in a more paperless environment.

Reproducible: Didn't try



Expected Results:  
Implementation in future versions. Adding a small document management function could help to establish thunderbird in a more paperless environment.

comments.creator: m-wada@usa.com
comments.raw_text:
Same request as followng already-existent bug or combination of bugs?
> Bug 91106  : "Change subject" feature
> Bug 254739 : [RFE] Allow edit any message (Note: real edit, not "edit as new")
> Bug 360975 : Message Handling: Add ability to 'Pencil Edit' received messages
Read also bugs listed in Dependency tree for Bug 91106 and dup bugs of them, please.
